titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Smithsonian Institution Archives

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Smithsonian Institution Archives, Accession 98-137, History of Science Society, Treasurer's Records

scopecontent.head: Descriptive Entry
scopecontent.p: This accession consists of Treasurer's records, and include correspondence, committee minutes and reports, auditors' reports, financial summaries, account activities, Treasurer's reports, budget worksheets, audit and financial statements, journal summaries, and financial data on grants.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following access terms. These are links to collections with related topics, persons or places.

controlaccess.head: Physical Characteristics of Materials in the Collection
